Class Algorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • Algorithm

  • public class Algorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing all of the algorithms for board events

      • moveOne

        public void moveOne(int playerMoving)
        Moves the player'sfirst movable piece found in the board (Goes row by row from 1,1 | 2,1 ... | to 8,8)
        Parameters:
        playerMoving - The player ID of the player whose turn it currently is.

      • moveMostJumps

        public int moveMostJumps(int player,
                         int opponent,
                         Tile[][] nextTempBoard,
                         int y,
                         int x,
                         int currentMaxJA,
                         int jumpAmount,
                         java.lang.String p)
        Moves the player's token that can make the most jumps in one turn.
        Parameters:
        player - The player's ID.
        opponent - The opponent's ID.
        nextTempBoard - The board to be analyzed following the previous iteration.
        y - The Y coordinate of the token.
        x - The X coordinate of the token.
        currentMaxJA - The highest number of jumps currently held for a possible path.
        jumpAmount - The current number of jumps held for the current path traversed.
        p - The Path order of the previous jumps using U,L,D,R.
        Returns:
        number jumps the token can move for the max

      • getJumpedPath

        public java.lang.String getJumpedPath()
        Returns:
        The longest path for the previously checked token.

      • clearPath

        public void clearPath()
        Clears the longest path from the previously checked token.

      • moveMax

        public void moveMax(CoordinatePair token)
        Moves based upon the path of the current token
        Parameters:
        token - The token currently being moved

      • moveLeastMoves

        public int moveLeastMoves(boolean firstJump,
                          int player,
                          int opponent,
                          Tile[][] nextTempBoard,
                          int y,
                          int x,
                          int currentMaxJA,
                          int jumpAmount,
                          java.lang.String p,
                          int movableLowestOpponent)
        Finds and makes the jump(s) of the path based on our heuristic. Our heuristic is to reduce the number of movable pieces the opponent has.
        Parameters:
        firstJump - To determine if it is the first jump to be made
        player - The player's ID
        opponent - The opponent's ID
        nextTempBoard - The temporary board created from the previous move
        y - The Y Coordinate of the token.
        x - The X Coordinate of the token.
        currentMaxJA - The highest number of jumps currently held for a possible path.
        jumpAmount - The current number of jumps held for the current path traversed.
        p - The Path order of the previous jumps using U,L,D,R.
        movableLowestOpponent - The number of pieces the opponent can move based upon the current board
        Returns:
        The lowest number of tokens the opponent can move in a possible board

      • optimalPath

        public java.lang.String optimalPath()
        Provides the String of the best path for the token determined by the heuristic.
        Returns:
        The String of the best path for the token determined by the heuristic.

      • clearOptimal

        public void clearOptimal()
        Clears the optimal path string from the previously checked token.

      • miniMax

        public int miniMax(Tile[][] state,
                   int player)
        Minimax start method for the algorithm
        Parameters:
        state - Current Board as is
        player - Current moving player's ID
        Returns:
        The number for the movable pieces for the opponent based on the best move

        public int miniMaxABP(Tile[][] state,
                      int player)

        Parameters:

        player - Current moving player's ID
        Returns:

      • maxValueABP

        public int maxValueABP(Tile[][] state,
                       int turnCounter,
                       int alpha,
                       int beta)
        Performs the Max portion of the Minimax with ABP algorithm
        Parameters:
        state - The board
        turnCounter - The turn number
        alpha - Alpha value
        beta - Beta Value
        Returns:
        max value for the Max portion of the Minimax with ABP algorithm

      • minValueABP

                       int turnCounter,
                       int alpha,
                       int beta)
        Performs the Max portion of the Minimax with ABP algorithm
        Parameters:
        state - The board
        turnCounter - The turn number
        alpha - Alpha value
        beta - Beta Value
        Returns:

      • calculateMovable

        public int calculateMovable(int player,
                            int opponent,
                            Tile[][] tempBoard)
        Calculates the number of movable pieces the opponent has based upon the given board.
        Parameters:
        player - The player's ID.
        opponent - The opponent's ID.
        tempBoard - The board passed to be evaluated on.
        Returns:
        The number of movable pieces the opponent has.

      • makeAllMovesList

        public int makeAllMovesList(boolean firstJump,
                            int player,
                            int opponent,
                            Tile[][] nextTempBoard,
                            int y,
                            int x,
                            int currentMaxJA,
                            int jumpAmount,
                            java.lang.String p,
                            int movableLowestOpponent)
        Goes and sets the list of all possible jumps for all movable tokens for the player Also gets the lowest number of movable tokens the opponent can move
        Parameters:
        firstJump - To determine if it is the first jump to be made
        player - The player's ID
        opponent - The opponent's ID
        nextTempBoard - The temporary board created from the previous move
        y - The Y Coordinate of the token.
        x - The X Coordinate of the token.
        currentMaxJA - The highest number of jumps currently held for a possible path.
        jumpAmount - The current number of jumps held for the current path traversed.
        p - The Path order of the previous jumps using U,L,D,R.
        movableLowestOpponent - The number of pieces the opponent can move based upon the current board
        Returns:
        The lowest number of tokens the opponent can move in a possible board

      • makeAllMovableList

        public java.util.ArrayList<CoordinatePair> makeAllMovableList(Tile[][] state,
                                                              int p,
                                                              int o)
        Makes the list of all possible moves for each movable token
        Parameters:
        state - The board state
        p - The player ID
        o - The opponent ID
        Returns:
        The list of movable tokens containing all their moves
